channel.title: Comments on: Alignment and Oil Change

item.title: By: Richard
item.dc:creator: Richard
item.description:
>Inexplicably, and for the first time in what seems like forever, I have been driving the car more than I have been working on it
It's a bittersweet feeling though, isn't it? Finally driving the project car you've been working on for so long, but also knowing that the end of a big project is in sight. Then again, I guess that just means it's time to find another project to start ;)
item.content:encoded:
>Inexplicably, and for the first time in what seems like forever, I have been driving the car more than I have been working on it

It’s a bittersweet feeling though, isn’t it? Finally driving the project car you’ve been working on for so long, but also knowing that the end of a big project is in sight. Then again, I guess that just means it’s time to find another project to start ;)
